abstract.t: This document reproduces the content of the ITU-T Study Group 16 White Document draft of H.248 Annex G, which is scheduled for decision in Geneva in November 2000. H.248 Annex G provides packages for 'User Interface Elements and Actions'. Specifically, the packages in Annex G include: - Display - Key - Keypad - Label key - Function key - Indicator - Soft key - Ancillary input This document is submitted for IETF comment prior to ITU-T decision, in accordance with procedures currently being negotiated between ITU-T Study Group and ISOC on behalf of the IETF.
